titleStmt.title: A proclamation offering a revvard for apprehending Mr. John Welsch traitor, and others
Proclamations. 1679-02-06
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Edinburgh, the sexth day of February, 1679. and of Our Reign the one and threttieth year.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
